text: We have an Enterprise Content Marketer. My main piece of advice would be to keep an eye on requests / workload, particularly if they work with Sales. This role *isn't* sales enablement (we have product marketers for that), but Sales still has a lot of requests! And also: will thought leadership fall under this role? If so, who is supplying the "thought"? (Coordinating with internal execs is another aspect that can take up a lot more time and mental energy than you might initially think)

text: Re: Data Content Marketer -- that sounds like a dream to have that dedicated role! I might not call them a "marketer," though, since they don't own their own programs or campaigns. It sounds more like an operations or analyst role?
